name: Solar Edge (Villagerjj)
description:
This game will have you fight against a pretty intelligent (at some times) Enemy, it is a very short game. ported over in a mere 2 days. I think it has potential, but I will need some feedback to flesh it out.

Follow my progress here: https://trello.com/b/7bhupdOE/solaredge

Music was done by:

krümel (crumb)

Titlescreen press start SFX:
Ember#1765 / DeerTears
